decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (244-A3-1200, dated 17/04/13, received 13/09/13; 244-A3-1000, dated 18/04/13, received 11/07/13; and Design and Access Statement, dated 18/04/13, received 11/07/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for A2 (Financial and Professional Services) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times, 9:00am to 10:00pm Monday to Saturday, and 9:00am to 6:00pm on Sundays and Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The access doorway to the A2 unit shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.
description: Change of use of the premises from existing retail unit (A1 use) to proposed professional & financial services (A2 use)
